Name: Quest: Escape Dungeon
About the game: From a long time ago, there was a tale of a mystical cave full of treasures. Many brave souls went for the quest to find it, but none of them return. Three friends decide to try the luck to find the cave. But they do not know that a road to cave is full of deadly traps and fearful guardians. Help young adventurers to find the cave, solve all puzzles, defeat cave guardians, steal cave treasures and get back home safely. Good luck on your journey! Features: * Logical puzzles * Turn-based JRPG styled combat. * Three heroes. * Quick and slick save\load system. * Pixel graphics. * Atmospheric OST. * Achievements. * Keyboard and mouse control.
